title: Attempting To Reconnect Alot
body: I was in a ranked game and it just keeped Attempting to reconnect its happened 2 times so far and its only 15 minutes into the game has anyone else got to problem?

replies.body: Yea i mean this has been happening just randomly in my ranked games it happens like once after like 5 or so games in this past week xD
Yup also for me, which seems strange, cause i have a stable 100/100 connection xD
Is this a common occurrence for you, or just right now?
